outline:
1. to domineer, exercise power over, dominate, have mastery, be master, lord it over
    1. (Qal) to domineer, lord it over, become master
    2. (Hiphil)
      1. to give power of
      2. to get mastery of
kjv_def: (bear, have) rule, have dominion, give (have) power.
strongs_def: to dominate, i.e. govern; by implication, to permit
